name: amp-pets-story
description: This folder contains the files for the "Create a visual AMP Story" tutorial.

scripts.convert: ffmpeg -r 120 -f image2 -s 1920x1080 -i ./results/out1.png -vcodec libx264 -crf 25 -pix_fmt yuv420p ./parts/out1.mp4 && ffmpeg -r 120 -f image2 -s 1920x1080 -i ./results/out2.png
